title: Blackguards.Special.Edition.[GOG]
description:
Blackguards.Special.Edition.[GOG]

Year: 2014
Genre: RPG / Strategy / Fantasy
Developer: Daedalic Entertainment
Publisher: Daedalic Entertainment / GOG

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7/8
Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Processor (2.4 GHz Quad Core Processor recommended)
Memory: 2 GB RAM (4 GB recommended)
Video Card: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / GT, ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT graphics card 
(NVIDIA GeForce GTX 275, ATI Radeon 4770 Series or higher recommended)
Audio device: DirectX 9.0c Compatible Sound Card with Latest Drivers
Hard disk space: 20 GB
Publication Type: License
Language: English, Russian, German, French, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese, Italian
Language: English, German
Crack: Not required (DRM Free from GOG.com)

Description: 

What happens when the last hope of the world is in danger would not 
in the hands of the heroes in shining armor, and in the hands of a 
gang of criminals and the dregs of society? Game Blackguards, a new 
turn-based strategy RPG, answers this question. You will discover 
180 unique hexagonal cards that serve battlefield. On each of them 
you will find a dark and tangled history of crime associated with 
drug trafficking and murder.
Play as a warrior, mage or hunter skills of your character and choose 
at will. Exciting campaign tells the story of doubt, betrayal and loss. 
That is, you specify the course of history in key plot twists and determine 
the outcome of events.

Bonus content included for FREE with purchase: 

manual, 
5 avatars, 
5 wallpapers, 
developer interview (English), 
developer interview (German),  
extended soundtrack (MP3), 
extended soundtrack (FLAC),

DLC

Blackguards:Untold Legends
